morning.title: A New Beginning
morning.description: The sun streams through your window. It's the first day of the last month of summer. You remember you have to get ready for school starting next month, which means visiting a few places today. Your main goal is to **visit the Library, the Cafe, and the Park** before heading home to prepare for tomorrow.

choices.text: Head out and start your errands

afternoon.title: Town Square
afternoon.description: You're standing in the town square. From here you can get to the Library, the Cafe, or the Park. Where to first?

library.title: The Library
library.description: You spend some time at the library, picking up a few books for the upcoming semester. One down, two to go.

cafe.title: The Cafe
cafe.description: You grab a coffee at your favorite spot. The energy helps you feel ready for the rest of the day.

park.title: The Park
park.description: You take a relaxing stroll through the park, clearing your head before the busy school year begins.

night.title: Home at Last
night.description: You've finished all your errands and are finally back home. It was a productive day. You feel prepared for whatever comes next.
